description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.
Master the art of building interactive web applications with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Explore data analysis and visualization using the R programming language and its libraries.
Get started with Java programming and build your foundation in object-oriented programming.
Learn how to build modern web applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

course_name: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
description: Harness the power of Python for data analysis, machine learning, and AI applications.
Gain a strong understanding of C++ programming, from basics to advanced concepts.
Create visually stunning websites with HTML, CSS, and responsive design techniques.
Dive into the world of machine learning and deep learning to build intelligent systems.
